TypeTeamMember.biography: Hiram is the Vice President of Advanced Advertising for TripleLift. He oversees the strategic development, marketing, implementation and execution of marketplace solutions for the companyâ€™s OTT business. Prior to joining TripleLift, Hiram worked in both the digital pricing & inventory and ad sales strategy teams at Viacom and led the strategic marketing group at Hulu. Hiram started his career as an analyst at Morgan Stanley in their Foreign Exchange department, after graduating from Howard University with a degree in Finance.
